title: HOW do you display your summoner icon(like the na lcs msi thing)
body: I have no idea how to do it but I am pretty sure that you can display your summoner icon just like your mastery(e.g lvl 6 or 7) but I have seen in other discussions people said use ctrl 6 but it didn't work. So can i change my hotkey for displaying my na lcs thing or am I just dumb and you can't display it?

replies.body: The hotkey for those Tier 2 MSI icon emotes is the same as the mastery emote which is ctrl+6 by default. I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it doesn't look like you've bought the tier 2 version which is why the emote isn't working. The emotes are only attached to the tier 2 icons.
